sections.heading: of jury; applicability of law.The general mode of summoning, impaneling, challenging and swearing the jury is not changed by this code
sections.text: SourceR.S.1867, Code § 282, p. 441;R.S.1913, § 7845;C.S.1922, § 8789;C.S.1929, § 20-1106;R.S.1943, § 25-1106.AnnotationsPeremptory challenges and challenges for caus
